subject: Soccer
UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: While Arsenal rolled over in a 2-0 loss at Dortmund that could have been far worse, Ludogorets Razgrad stood tall before falling late at Liverpool, 2-1.
snippet: While Arsenal rolled over in a 2-0 loss at Dortmund that could have been far worse, Ludogorets Razgrad stood tall before falling late at Liverpool, 2-1.
